CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 10 - Freedom of expression-{general} (Article 10-1 - Freedom of expression)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and at the time of lodging his application he was serving his prison sentence in the Bolu F - type prison .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant wrote a letter to ORG , in which he had praised the imprisoned leader of the ORG , PERSON by using the honorific “ sayın ” , meaning esteemed .

CARDINAL . Pursuant to the ORG on the administration of penitentiary institutions and the execution of sentences , the applicant was found guilty of breaching prison order by the Bolu F- type ORG ( referred hereafter as “ the Board ” ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was sentenced to CARDINAL days’ solitary confinement on the orders of ORG , on account of his statements in the above mentioned letter .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Bolu Enforcement Judge rejected the applicant`s objection .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of DATE .
